listChange.change: Pascoli writes all the poem. The writing is very linear and clean at the beginning (it's mostly a copy), but after the 6th stanza, there are instant corrections.
Complete reading of the page with corrections using pencil. Pascoli tries some alternatives
New corrections. Pascoli also writes a new version of st. 6.
Classification elements, written by Maria Pascoli using pencil.
Classification elements, written by the Archive, using pencil.
